```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
NIS_2018_Core <- read_csv("~/datathon/NIS_2018_Core.csv")
NIS_2018_Severity <- read_csv("~/datathon/NIS_2018_Severity.csv")

icd_2018 <- sprintf("i10_dx%d",seq(1:40))
PPH_Core_2018 <- NIS_2018_Core %>% filter_at(icd_2018, any_vars(.%in% c("O720","O721", "O722", "O723")))
trial_core_2018 <- NIS_2018_Core%>% head(10)
trial_severity_2018 <- NIS_2018_Severity %>% head(20)
```

```{r}
#left_join
left_join(trial_core_2018, trial_severity_2018, by = "key_nis")

trial_core_2018_int <- trial_core_2018 %>% 
  mutate(key = as.integer(as.character(key_nis)))

trial_severity_2018_int <- trial_severity_2018 %>% 
  mutate(key = as.integer(as.character(key_nis)))

left_join(trial_core_2018_int, trial_severity_2018_int, by = "key")

```
